#include <stdio.h>
int main()
{
	char str[]="zyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbzyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbzyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbzyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbzyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcb";
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		int i;
		for(i=125-n;i<125;i++)
		{
			printf("%c",str[i]);
			if(str[i]=='b')
				printf("a");
		}
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
